sections.title: Process optimization principper
sections.content:
# Process Optimization

## Design of Experiments (DOE)
- **Factorial design**: Test multiple variabler samtidig
- **Response surface**: Find optimal conditions
- **Statistical significance**: Identificer kritiske parametre

## Critical Process Parameters
- **pH**: ±0.1 pH kan påvirke performance dramatisk
- **Conductivity**: Binding og elution behavior
- **Flow rate**: Resolution vs. throughput
- **Temperature**: Stabilitet og binding

## Quality by Design (QbD)
- **Define**: Target product profile
- **Identify**: Critical quality attributes
- **Understand**: Process parameter impacts
- **Control**: Within acceptable ranges

sections.title: Scale-up strategier
sections.content:
# Scale-up Principles

## Geometric scaling
- **Column diameter**: Area scales med batch størrelse
- **Column height**: Bevares for at maintaine resolution
- **Flow rate**: Linear velocity konstant

## Process scaling
- **Mass transfer**: Kan ændres ved scale-up
- **Mixing**: Vigtigere ved større volumen
- **Heat transfer**: Kan blive limitation

## Validation approach
- **Pilot scale**: 10-100x lab scale
- **Performance qualification**: Sammenlign metrics
- **Robustness testing**: Variation tolerance

sections.title: Quality control implementering
sections.content:
# Quality Control

## In-process monitoring
- **UV280**: Real-time protein monitoring
- **Conductivity**: Salt gradient tracking
- **pH**: Process parameter verification

## Release testing
- **Purity**: SDS-PAGE, HPLC
- **Activity**: Functional assays
- **Endotoxin**: For pharmaceutical applications
- **Bioburden**: Microbial contamination

## Stability testing
- **Accelerated**: Elevated temperature
- **Real-time**: Storage conditions
- **Stress**: Extreme conditions testing
